## Pack.get() method

Get a pack by id

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(packId: string): Promise<PackMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packId | string | the id of the pack to fetch |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[PackMetadata](./sdk.packmetadata.md)&gt;
